title: 193 - Philip Morris: Dividend Dream Or Dreadful Mistake? (Ian Bezek)
description: Is the dividend offered by Philip Morris worth the risk? Revenues continue to fall as the yield continues to climb. Ian and Brian discuss the pros and cons.
content:encoded: Is the dividend offered by Philip Morris worth the risk? Revenues continue to fall as the yield continues to climb. Ian and Brian discuss the pros and cons.
